Ecosystem Builders Meetup - October 2025

Event Details

Tuesday, September 30, 2025 08:30-10:00
London, UK; register to see the full address
2.5 hours
↗ Register on Luma

About This Event

Join the UK Delegation at GEC 2025

We recently partnered with the Global Entrepreneurship Network (GEN) to support the UK delegation at the Global Entrepreneurship Congress (GEC) in Indianapolis, Indiana. This international event brought together entrepreneurs, investors, policymakers, and ecosystem builders from over 200 countries.

This gathering is designed for entrepreneurs, ecosystem leaders, innovation experts, and policy advocates whose mission is to support the development of the UK's entrepreneurial ecosystem and drive innovation globally.

Whether you're leading an accelerator, corporate innovation team, policymaking body, university innovation office, or any venture support organisation, your work helps founders and businesses launch, grow, and succeed.

Come connect over coffee and conversation with fellow leaders who believe in technology, collaboration, and building stronger entrepreneurial ecosystems worldwide. You'll hear insights from key sessions, including technical enablement strategies and high-level discussions from the Ministerial Room.

Highlights included a keynote by Mark Cuban on innovation, AI, and the global role of entrepreneurship, as well as the launch of GEN's Vision 2035 initiative for a more connected and data-driven ecosystem.

We can only accommodate a limited number of attendees, so please request to join before being accepted. All our events are free, and we're happy to provide support regarding accessibility.

Don't miss this chance to network, share ideas, and be part of shaping the global entrepreneurial community!
